subject: Football
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Tom Brady, the New England Patriots quarterback, became the first unanimous choice for the Associated Press N.F.L. most valuable player award since The A.P. began using a nationwide panel of media members.
snippet: Tom Brady, the New England Patriots quarterback, became the first unanimous choice for the Associated Press N.F.L. most valuable player award since The A.P. began using a nationwide panel of media members.
